title: Operational research to End TB: 2
abstract: In 2009, The Union developed two new approaches to build operational research capacity in low- and middle-income countries. First, an output-orientated model of training, in which participants learned research skills and simultaneously conducted and published a research study. Second, operational research fellowships were created and persons appointed to national programmes conducted relevant country-wide research.
